articles.title: Jimmy Butler scores playoff career-high 45 points, Heat top Hawks for 2-0 series lead - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Jimmy Butler poured in a playoff career-high 45 points, including a personal 7-0 run in the closing moments to seal Miami's 115-105 win.
articles.content:
MIAMI Jimmy Butler walked off the floor when his night's work was complete, lifted his arms in the air and heard a sold-out arena serenade him with screams.
